text: General Arthit Kamlang-ek (31 August 1925 - 19 January 2015; , ) was a Thai general.Chao-Tzang Yawnghwe, The Politics of Authoritarianism: The State and Political Soldiers in Burma, Indonesia and Thailand, Chapter 5: Thailand: Military Intervention and the Politics of Authoritarian Domination He was the Commander-in-Chief of the Royal Thai Army from 1982 to 1986 and parallel the Supreme Commander of the Royal Thai Armed Forces from 1983 to 1986. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Arthit Kamlang-ek
title: Arthit Kamlang-ek
